author: John MacLean
text: I'm looking for names of other cities/communities who may have instituted an initiative that provides a list of projects for the consideration of civic and community organizations to donate money and/or in-kind services.  Examples would be; restoring a war memorial, repairs to a park theater or a park itself, historic landmark, or perhaps other miscellaneous projects that cannot be considered due to budget cuts.
title: civic and community donations for projects
